attrs.script:
#script

base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.3.1/record:host?_return_fields%2B=name,ipv4addrs"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]

if "@@{VLAN}@@" == "9":
    network="192.168.9.0/24"
elif "@@{VLAN}@@" == "159":
    network="192.168.159.0/24"
else:
    print "Error: unknown vlan"
    exit(1)

reservation_payload = {}
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = []
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = [{"ipv4addr":"func:nextavailableip:"+network}]

for host in vmName:
    reservation_payload['name'] = host + ".@@{domain}@@"
    payload = json.dumps(reservation_payload)
    print "Payload: " + payload
    print "URL: " + base_url
    print headers

    # make the API call and capture the results in the variable called "resp"
    resp = urlreq(base_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=user, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(reservation_payload), headers=headers)
    print resp

    # deal with the result/response
    if resp.ok:
        print json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4) #this prints the content of the response
        if resp.status_code == 201:
            result = json.loads(resp.content)
            ip = result['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
            print ip
        else:
            print "Status code: {}".format(resp.status_code)
        exit(0)
    else:
        print "Request failed", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4) #this prints the content of the response
        exit(1) #this makes sure the task will return as FALSE

#script

get_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?name="
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]
i = 1


def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

for host in vmName:
    base_url = get_base_url + host.lower() + ".@@{domain}@@"
    print base_url
    r = process_request(base_url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result
    print result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    print "NODE"+str(i)+"_IP=",result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    i += 1

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
write_files: 
- content: |
    DEVICE="eth0"
    NM_CONTROLLED="no"
    ONBOOT="yes"
    BOOTPROTO=static
    IPADDR=@@{PreDeployment.NODE1_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{GATEWAY}@@
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
- content: |
    search @@{domain}@@
    nameserver @@{DNS_SERVER}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf
runcmd:
- service network restart

users:
  - name: @@{USERNAME}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{ROOT_PWD}@@
    @@{USERNAME}@@:@@{USERNAME_PWD}@@
  expire: False

bootcmd:
 - echo @@{PreDeployment.NODE1_IP}@@ @@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@.@@{domain}@@ >> /etc/hosts
 
runcmd:
 - [ hostnamectl, set-hostname, "@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@" ]
 - [ ifdown, eth0 ]
 - [ ifup, eth0 ]

attrs.script:
#script

get_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?name="
delete_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

for host in vmName:
    base_url = get_base_url + host.lower() +".@@{domain}@@"
    r = process_request(base_url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result[0]['_ref']
    print delete_base_url + result[0]['_ref']
    #################
    base_url = delete_base_url + result[0]['_ref']
    r = process_request(base_url, 'DELETE', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result

attrs.script:
#script
print "Enabling NGT..."

vm_uuid = "@@{platform.metadata.uuid}@@"
vm_uuid_url = "https://@@{PC_IP}@@:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/" + vm_uuid
cluster_uuid_url = "https://@@{PC_IP}@@:9440/api/nutanix/v3/clusters/"

pc_user = "@@{pc.username}@@"
pc_password = "@@{pc.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

print vm_uuid_url
r = process_request(vm_uuid_url, 'GET', pc_user, pc_password, headers)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result
print result["status"]["cluster_reference"]["uuid"]
cluster_uuid = result["status"]["cluster_reference"]["uuid"]
###########
cluster_uuid_url = cluster_uuid_url + cluster_uuid
r = process_request(cluster_uuid_url, 'GET', pc_user, pc_password, headers)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result
print result["status"]["resources"]["network"]["external_ip"]
cluster_ip = result["status"]["resources"]["network"]["external_ip"]
###########
config_url = "https://"+ cluster_ip + ":9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v1/vms/" + cluster_uuid + "::" + vm_uuid + "/guest_tools/"
print config_url
payload = {
  "vmUuid": cluster_uuid + "::" + vm_uuid,
  "enabled": "true",
  "applications": {
    "file_level_restore": "false",
    "vss_snapshot": "true"
  }
}
r = process_request(config_url, 'POST', pc_user, pc_password,headers, payload)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result

attrs.script:
#region capture Calm variables
    $appName= "@@{calm_application_name}@@" #this is how we named our
                                                   #application instance in calm
    $hostCount = @@{HOST_COUNT}@@ #this is used to keep track of how many VMs
                                                            #we are provisioning
    $dnsZone = "@@{domain}@@" #this is used to lookup hostnames
    $username = "@@{USERNAME}@@" #this is used to query AD for the user details
#endregion

#region initialize other variables
    $userInput = $appName.Substring(0,3).ToUpper() #this generates a 3 character
                                 #uppercase string based on the application name
    Write-Host $appName
#endregion

#region define unique hostname
    $i = [int]1 #we'll use this to generate a unique hostname in our Do ... 
                                                               #While loop below
    Do { #test hostnames until one which is not already registered in DNS is
                                                                          #found
        $index = '{0:D2}' -f $i #format our numerical index with 3 digits
                                                          #(it becomes a string)
        $hostname = 'P-HQ-VM-{0}{1}' -f $userInput,$index #build our hostname
                            #based on the application name trigram and our index
        $fqdn = '{0}.{1}' -f $hostname,$dnsZone #build the fqdn to lookup based
                                               #on the hostname and the DNS zone
        $found = Resolve-DnsName $fqdn -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue #see if our
                                          #hostname is registered in DNS already
        if (!$found) { #hostname was not registered in DNS
            $Error.Clear()
            break #breaking out of the loop
        }
        ++$i #increment our numerical counter
    } While ($i -le 99) #we break out only when the fqdn is not found or when we
                                                    #run out of numerical digits

    if ($i -gt 99) {
        Throw "[ERROR] We ran out of digits to generate a unique hostname!"
    }

    $node = "NODE{0}_NAME" -f $hostCount
    Write-Host "$node=$hostname"
#endregion

#region get formated user name
    $Requester = Get-ADUser -Filter "UserPrincipalName -eq '$username'"
    $user = $Requester.GivenName
    Write-Host "REQUESTER=$user"
#endregion

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#script

base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.3.1/record:host?_return_fields%2B=name,ipv4addrs"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]

if "@@{VLAN}@@" == "9":
    network="192.168.9.0/24"
elif "@@{VLAN}@@" == "159":
    network="192.168.159.0/24"
else:
    print "Error: unknown vlan"
    exit(1)

reservation_payload = {}
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = []
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = [{"ipv4addr":"func:nextavailableip:"+network}]

for host in vmName:
    reservation_payload['name'] = host + ".@@{domain}@@"
    payload = json.dumps(reservation_payload)
    print "Payload: " + payload
    print "URL: " + base_url
    print headers

    # make the API call and capture the results in the variable called "resp"
    resp = urlreq(base_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=user, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(reservation_payload), headers=headers)
    print resp

    # deal with the result/response
    if resp.ok:
        print json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4) #this prints the content of the response
        if resp.status_code == 201:
            result = json.loads(resp.content)
            ip = result['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
            print ip
        else:
            print "Status code: {}".format(resp.status_code)
        exit(0)
    else:
        print "Request failed", json.dumps(json.loads(resp.content), indent=4) #this prints the content of the response
        exit(1) #this makes sure the task will return as FALSE

#script

get_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?name="
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]
i = 1


def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

for host in vmName:
    base_url = get_base_url + host.lower() + ".@@{domain}@@"
    print base_url
    r = process_request(base_url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result
    print result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    print "NODE"+str(i)+"_IP=",result[0]['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']
    i += 1

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
write_files: 
- content: |
    DEVICE="eth0"
    NM_CONTROLLED="no"
    ONBOOT="yes"
    BOOTPROTO=static
    IPADDR=@@{PreDeployment.NODE1_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{GATEWAY}@@
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
- content: |
    search @@{domain}@@
    nameserver @@{DNS_SERVER}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf
runcmd:
- service network restart

users:
  - name: @@{USERNAME}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{ROOT_PWD}@@
    @@{USERNAME}@@:@@{USERNAME_PWD}@@
  expire: False

bootcmd:
 - echo @@{PreDeployment.NODE1_IP}@@ @@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@.@@{domain}@@ >> /etc/hosts
 
runcmd:
 - [ hostnamectl, set-hostname, "@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@" ]
 - [ ifdown, eth0 ]

attrs.script:
#script

get_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/record:host?name="
delete_base_url = "https://@@{INFOBLOX_IP}@@/wapi/v2.4/"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}
vmName = ["@@{AD.NODE1_NAME}@@"]

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

for host in vmName:
    base_url = get_base_url + host.lower() +".@@{domain}@@"
    r = process_request(base_url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result[0]['_ref']
    print delete_base_url + result[0]['_ref']
    #################
    base_url = delete_base_url + result[0]['_ref']
    r = process_request(base_url, 'DELETE', user, password, headers)
    result = json.loads(r.content)
    print result

#script
print "Enabling NGT..."

vm_uuid = "@@{platform.metadata.uuid}@@"
vm_uuid_url = "https://@@{PC_IP}@@:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/" + vm_uuid
cluster_uuid_url = "https://@@{PC_IP}@@:9440/api/nutanix/v3/clusters/"

pc_user = "@@{pc.username}@@"
pc_password = "@@{pc.secret}@@"
headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
    if (payload != None):
        payload = json.dumps(payload)
    r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
    return r

print vm_uuid_url
r = process_request(vm_uuid_url, 'GET', pc_user, pc_password, headers)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result
print result["status"]["cluster_reference"]["uuid"]
cluster_uuid = result["status"]["cluster_reference"]["uuid"]
###########
cluster_uuid_url = cluster_uuid_url + cluster_uuid
r = process_request(cluster_uuid_url, 'GET', pc_user, pc_password, headers)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result
print result["status"]["resources"]["network"]["external_ip"]
cluster_ip = result["status"]["resources"]["network"]["external_ip"]
###########
config_url = "https://"+ cluster_ip + ":9440/PrismGateway/services/rest/v1/vms/" + cluster_uuid + "::" + vm_uuid + "/guest_tools/"
print config_url
payload = {
  "vmUuid": cluster_uuid + "::" + vm_uuid,
  "enabled": "true",
  "applications": {
    "file_level_restore": "false",
    "vss_snapshot": "true"
  }
}
r = process_request(config_url, 'POST', pc_user, pc_password,headers, payload)
result = json.loads(r.content)
print result

#region capture Calm variables
    $appName= "@@{calm_application_name}@@" #this is how we named our
                                                   #application instance in calm
    $hostCount = @@{HOST_COUNT}@@ #this is used to keep track of how many VMs
                                                            #we are provisioning
    $dnsZone = "@@{domain}@@" #this is used to lookup hostnames
    $username = "@@{USERNAME}@@" #this is used to query AD for the user details
#endregion

#region initialize other variables
    $userInput = $appName.Substring(0,3).ToUpper() #this generates a 3 character
                                 #uppercase string based on the application name
    Write-Host $appName
#endregion

#region define unique hostname
    $i = [int]1 #we'll use this to generate a unique hostname in our Do ... 
                                                               #While loop below
    Do { #test hostnames until one which is not already registered in DNS is
                                                                          #found
        $index = '{0:D2}' -f $i #format our numerical index with 3 digits
                                                          #(it becomes a string)
        $hostname = 'P-HQ-VM-{0}{1}' -f $userInput,$index #build our hostname
                            #based on the application name trigram and our index
        $fqdn = '{0}.{1}' -f $hostname,$dnsZone #build the fqdn to lookup based
                                               #on the hostname and the DNS zone
        $found = Resolve-DnsName $fqdn -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue #see if our
                                          #hostname is registered in DNS already
        if (!$found) { #hostname was not registered in DNS
            $Error.Clear()
            break #breaking out of the loop
        }
        ++$i #increment our numerical counter
    } While ($i -le 99) #we break out only when the fqdn is not found or when we
                                                    #run out of numerical digits

    if ($i -gt 99) {
        Throw "[ERROR] We ran out of digits to generate a unique hostname!"
    }

    $node = "NODE{0}_NAME" -f $hostCount
    Write-Host "$node=$hostname"
#endregion

#region get formated user name
    $Requester = Get-ADUser -Filter "UserPrincipalName -eq '$username'"
    $user = $Requester.GivenName
    Write-Host "REQUESTER=$user"
#endregion
